MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VisualHit As DependencyObject
public: property System::Windows::DependencyObject ^ VisualHit { System::Windows::DependencyObject ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.value: 一个 值，该值表示命中的视觉对象。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>是类型而不<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>是, 因此命中测试可以通过视区来桥接二维和3d 树。
